whitelist.name: whitelist
whitelist.description: Modify whitelist permissions for a command. Choose the command type, and supply the username and ID of the user whose privileges must be modified

args.name: add
args.description: Add a user to the whitelist for this command. Applies to the children of this command.

args.name: remove
args.description: Remove a user from the whitelist for this command. Applies to the parents of this command.

args.name: cmds
args.description: List all commands currently in whitelist mode.

debug.name: debug
debug.description: Prints information about the message received. Supply one or more arguments to specify the data you would like to see.

args.name: user
args.description: Prints the username of the messenger

args.name: userID
args.description: Prints the identifying number of the messenger

args.name: channel
args.description: Prints the identifying number of the channel the message was sent to

vardump.name: vardump
vardump.description: Prints information about a variable in bot's memory. Supply one argument to specify the data you would like to see.

args.name: users
args.description: Prints the username and ID of all users bot has read messages from
